summary: Completed testing of CMS Settings functionality for Aircabio airport transfer platform. All features verified as WORKING: 1) CMS Settings Save - Admin can save website settings via admin panel, 2) CMS Settings Display - Header shows phone, email, tagline from CMS, 3) Footer shows contact info, address, social links, WhatsApp from CMS, 4) Homepage hero section shows title and subtitle from CMS, 5) Hero Section CMS fields - Admin can edit hero title, subtitle, background in CMS.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/website-settings - returns public settings - PASS
Backend: Hero section fields (hero_title, hero_subtitle, hero_background_url, hero_cta_text) save correctly - PASS
Backend: Social media URLs save correctly - PASS
Backend: Contact info (phone, email, address, whatsapp) save correctly - PASS
Backend: Settings persistence across requests - PASS
Backend: Unauthorized save rejected with 401 - PASS
Frontend: Homepage loads and displays CMS values - PASS
Frontend: Header top bar shows phone, email, tagline from CMS - PASS
Frontend: Hero section shows title and subtitle from CMS - PASS
Frontend: Footer shows contact info, address, social links from CMS - PASS
Frontend: WhatsApp button displays in footer when number is set - PASS
Frontend: Admin CMS panel loads with Site Settings tab - PASS
Frontend: Admin CMS panel shows Hero Section card with all fields - PASS
Frontend: CMS changes saved in admin reflect immediately on website - PASS
seed_data_creation: None - used existing CMS settings data
context_for_next_testing_agent: CMS Settings functionality fully working. Layout.js and HomePage.js correctly fetch from /api/website-settings endpoint. CMSManager.js has Hero Section card with title, subtitle, background fields. WebsiteSettings model in server.py includes hero_title, hero_subtitle, hero_background_url, hero_cta_text fields. Test credentials: admin@aircabio.com / Aircabio@2024!

cms_settings_save.description: Admin can save website settings (site name, tagline, contact info, social media, hero section)
cms_settings_save.verification: POST /api/admin/website-settings saves all fields correctly, verified via GET /api/website-settings

cms_header_display.description: Header shows phone, email, tagline from CMS
cms_header_display.verification: Layout.js fetches from /api/website-settings and displays contactPhone, contactEmail, tagline in top bar

cms_footer_display.description: Footer shows contact info, address, social links, WhatsApp from CMS
cms_footer_display.verification: Layout.js displays contactPhone, contactEmail, contactAddress, whatsappNumber, social URLs in footer

cms_hero_display.description: Homepage hero section shows title and subtitle from CMS
cms_hero_display.verification: HomePage.js fetches from /api/website-settings and displays heroTitle, heroSubtitle, heroImage

cms_hero_fields.description: Admin can edit hero title, subtitle, background image in CMS
cms_hero_fields.verification: CMSManager.js has Hero Section card with inputs for hero_title, hero_subtitle, hero_background_url, hero_cta_text
